Quick start

Welcome to the quick start guide for creating your own Telegram bot! Follow these simple steps to get your bot up and running in no time.

Step 1: Create a Telegram Account

If you don’t have a Telegram account, start by creating one. Download the Telegram app on your mobile device or visit the Telegram website to sign up.

Step 2: Set Up a New Bot on Telegram

  1. Open the Telegram app and search for the “BotFather” bot.

  2. Start a chat with the BotFather and use the /newbot command to create a new bot.

  3. Follow the instructions provided by the BotFather to choose a name and username for your bot.

4. Once your bot is created, the BotFather will provide you with a token. Copy and save this token; you’ll need it to interact with the Telegram Bot API.

Step 3: Add token to the code

Paste token to the file src/my_bot/settings in str format.
